name: Sunrise Apartments
description: Sunrise Apartments offers a comfortable and secure living environment for students. Located just a few minutes from campus, it provides modern amenities and a friendly community.

name: Evergreen Lodge
description: Evergreen Lodge offers affordable, fully furnished apartments for students. Enjoy a range of amenities, including a swimming pool and on-site parking, all within walking distance to campus.

name: Maplewood Residences
description: Maplewood Residences provides premium student housing with private bathrooms and a range of recreational facilities. Ideal for students who value both comfort and convenience.

name: Campus Corner Apartments
description: Campus Corner Apartments are designed with students in mind, offering shared kitchens and study lounges, as well as a vibrant community atmosphere close to campus.

name: Oakwood Flats
description: Oakwood Flats offers spacious, pet-friendly apartments with in-unit laundry and a range of student-friendly services. Enjoy the convenience of an on-site cafeteria and weekly cleaning.

name: Pineview Studios
description: Pineview Studios offers affordable and modern living spaces for students. Enjoy the convenience of a study lounge and gym access, along with 24/7 security.

name: Riverside Dorms
description: Riverside Dorms provides a safe and friendly environment for students. Located by the river, it offers beautiful views and easy access to campus facilities.

name: Elmwood Apartments
description: Elmwood Apartments offer a comfortable and engaging living environment with a game room and fitness center. Ideal for students looking for a balanced lifestyle.

name: Birchwood Residence
description: Birchwood Residence provides a modern living experience with essential amenities. Located close to campus, it offers a perfect blend of convenience and comfort.

name: Cedar Grove Apartments
description: Cedar Grove Apartments offers premium student housing with a swimming pool and gym access. Located close to campus, it provides a safe and vibrant community.
